title: Disconnected from game and cannot reconnect
body: I tried playing a ranked game with my friend, but upon launching the game it disconnected me. I then could not reconnect for some reason, definitely not a wifi issue though. After my friend remakes the game, it says that I am still in a game. Anyway to help me?

replies.body:
It could certainly be a wi-fi issue if it's struggling to reach the game server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help get this fixed up, though, you'll want to test it in a custom games.

If you like, feel free to download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute 104.160.131.1 which is the NA game server.  This will give us an overview of where the hiccup is.  Just run it for 5 minutes and remove the first two sets of IPs, then let me know the results.
ill fixed it, u should to repair the client and it will be working
same here, fix it riot please
Just ran into the same issue... I dont know what is going on with it...
